info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 3:22PM EDT until June 16 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN BLADEN AND NORTHEASTERN COLUMBUS COUNTIES... At 322 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Southeastern Community College to near Whiteville to near Council, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Lake Waccamaw, Carvers, Hallsboro, Lisbon, Redbug, Elkton, Emerson, Council, Kelly, Brunswick, Clarkton, Bolton, East Arcadia and Columbus Regional Healthcare System. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
